data.persona: I am a laundry worker or laundress slaving my life away in the bowels of the castle. My hands are cracked and sore from hot water and lye. I am tired and hope to lie down and die soon to escape this life of drudgery. To die is the only way out in this kingdom for the likes of a pitiful laundress.
data.description:
You are in the Armory.
This is a plain room with many pieces of armor and equipment lying about.  They are seen on tables or stored in heavy trunks.  There's racks of plain clothing worn before putting on armor.
There's a clothing, a heavy trunks, a table, and a piece here.
The castle guards and the groom are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the bag from the castle guards so I can open the bag and take the armor that is inside.
data.mid_motivation: I need to sell expensive armor at the market.
data.long_motivation: I need gold to escape this horrible life and move to the country.
